item.title: 508 Command
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“sonicforce41, post:1, topic:342171”]How can i make this command, Not apply to a certain username or a ip
Like im getting banned in my own server on a different account.
I want to trick them into saying i cant get banned:D

if (cmd[0].equals("ban")) { String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)]; if (p2 != null || p2 != "USERNAME") { p2.getActionSender().logout(p2); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "The player " + p2.username + " has been banned."); p2.appendToBanned(victim); Server.loadBannedUsers(); BufferedWriter bw = null; p.updateReq = true; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }[/quote]
fixed in quote.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Command
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

How can i make this command, Not apply to a certain username or a ip
Like im getting banned in my own server on a different account.
I want to trick them into saying i cant get banned:D

if (cmd[0].equals("ban")) { String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.getActionSender().logout(p2); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "The player " + p2.username + " has been banned."); p2.appendToBanned(victim); Server.loadBannedUsers(); BufferedWriter bw = null; p.updateReq = true; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }

Read full topic
